title: 2. Kong: Skull Island $27.8M
text: 70MM VIP Sweepstakes Hawaii Sweepstakes You could win a trip to the filming location in Hawaii. Don't forget to join during checkout - it's free! NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. TERMS APPLY. VIP Sweepstakes Buy tickets now and you could win a trip to the filming location in Hawaii. Not a member? Join now or during checkout - it's free! NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Void where prohibited. Sweepstakes begins at 10:00 a.m. Pacific Time (“PT”) on 3/7/17 and ends at 10:00 a.m. PT on 3/21/17. Open to legal residents of 49 U.S. states & D.C. (void in RI, Puerto Rico, all U.S. territories, possessions and overseas military installations), 18 or older (or age majority in jurisdiction of residence, whichever is older) with active email account and Internet access as of 3/7/17. Odds of winning dependent upon total number of eligible entries received. 1-Grand Prize: four (4) night trip to Hawaii for Grand Prize Winner and guest consisting of: roundtrip economy class airfare to Hawaii (approximate retail value (“ARV”): $2,000), four (4) nights hotel stay (double occupancy) (ARV: $1,810), Kualoa Ranch Movie Sites Tour (ARV: $160), Sunset catamaran cruise off of Waikiki Beach, (ARV: $125), spending money for ground transportation and meals (ARV: $750), travel insurance (ARV: $150). All details shall be determined by Sponsor and/or Prize Provider in their sole discretion. The total ARV of the Grand Prize is four thousand nine hundred ninety five dollars and zero cents ($4,495). See Official Rules at www.fandango.com/sweepstakesrules/kong for complete prize details, retail values, and free alternate method of entry. Sponsor: Fandango Media, LLC.
